md:
giải nghĩa từ "root" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Root: /ruːt/ (noun)
	+ Meaning: phần gốc, gốc rễ
	+ Example: The root of the problem is the lack of communication.
	+ Related words: rootless, root out, take root, root for

* Root: /ruːt/ (verb)
	+ Meaning: đào, tìm kiếm
	+ Example: The police rooted through the suspect's belongings.
	+ Related words: root around, root out, root up

* Root: /ruːt/ (verb, sports)
	+ Meaning: cổ vũ, ủng hộ
	+ Example: The fans rooted for their team during the championship game.
	+ Related words: root for, root against

Note: The word "root" has multiple meanings and uses, and the meanings provided above are just a few examples.

    • Meaning: phần gốc, gốc rễ

  • Root: /ruːt/ (verb)

    • Meaning: đào, tìm kiếm
    • Example: The police rooted through the suspect's belongings.
    • Related words: root around, root out, root up

  • Root: /ruːt/ (verb, sports)

    • Meaning: cổ vũ, ủng hộ

Note: The word "root" has multiple meanings and uses, and the meanings provided above are just a few examples.
